name: Mohammad Awais
aboutMeHeadline: I'm Mohammad Awais, a Flutter Developer, Web Developer and a Software Developer.
aboueMeDetails: I'm a Fresh Graduate with Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering from SBJITMR, Nagpur. I have been developing mobile apps for around 1 year now. I have worked in teams for various startups and helped them in launching their prototypes and got valuable learning experience.
